# Daze Monster (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Compulsion Spells|compulsion]]) \[[[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Bard Spells|Bard 2]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[1st Level Summoner Spells|Summoner 1]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a pinch of wool or similar substance)

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Target:** One living creature of 6HD or less

**Duration:** 1 round

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 264

This spell functions like *[[Daze (Spell)|daze]]**,* but it can affect any one living creature of any type. Creatures of 7 or more HD are not affected.
